title: Found some great Zac skins I thought the community should see
body:
***Snowman Zac*** - http://lolskinconcepts.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/snowman_zac_by_mikaf-d6xfj87.jpg
***Pool Party Zac*** - http://lolskinconcepts.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/league_of_legends__pool_party_zac_by_gisalmeida-d8313mr.jpg
***Spooky Zac*** - http://lolskinconcepts.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/spooky_zac__and_pumpkin_teemo___by_mattcomgo-d6o5gaq.jpg
***Banana Split Zac*** - http://lolskinconcepts.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/XPBhkLK.png



**Hopefully Riot will admire at least one of these beautiful Zac skins. He doesn't get much love when it comes to skins anyways! **

**EDIT: If you enjoy the skins please up-vote so it can get some notice!**

replies.body: ill take 1 of each please
agreed
agreed
I love pool party Zac.  That one has a cool look to it.
Pool-party Zac = Chaos Zero
you just made my day, good sir

http://www.michelinrespectforcommunities.com/media/40261/michelin_new_mast.jpg

How about this (   ͡°  ͜ʖ   ͡°)
i'm so glad i'm not the only person who's thought of that seeing the snowman skin xD
With his Banana Split skin, he can actually feed the enemy team... a sweet and cold taste of justice!
If they release that Pool Party skin, Riot will be $10 richer, and I don't even own Zac
you say 10$ i say a couple million. that skin is a must XD

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100708084128/dragonball/images/thumb/e/e4/MajinBuuSuperNV..png/280px-MajinBuuSuperNV..png

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ondq9zKummI
I've wanted this from the second saw {{champion:154}}
Banana Split would be awesome, Zac wouldnt be one solid blob lol
Why couldn't Riot make any of these, instead of that incredibly lazy "special weapon" Zac?
Excuse me if I'm really wrong, but wasn't special weapon Zac one of the skins that come with the Champion on release?(pure guess because of yasuo and highnoon on release)

Only if you buy the bundle, which most people do not do. Only about 10 percent of the league community buy microtransactions, and a good amount of those are one time buys. It'd be save to say less than 5 percent of league players buy bundles, so most ppl did not get the skin with the champ.
I imagine the tech innovation just to make him possible with all his goey animations was a big hurdle at the time.

> I imagine the tech innovation just to make him possible with all his goey animations was a big hurdle at the time.

It's not really innovation, it's just a lot, a LOT of painstakingly slow work by the animators, which is why Zac is unlikely to get many skins--the amount of work it takes to make a Zac skin is way more to make a skin for any other champion.
Banana Split is awesome!!!
bump pool party all the way and spooky too
Holy shit. Spooky Zac o.o Take my money
I second this movement. Especially because it's Teemo he's scaring. XD
If they use the pool party Zac, they've already got the splash ready to go right there!

Pool Party Zac's bloblets could be floater rings and cycle through different designs so have one thats like a duck floater, one thats a water wing, etc...

Snowman Zac could drop mini snow men, or parts of snow men like a top hat, corn cob pipe, etc... in a blob of snow

Sunday Zac could drop toppings like cherry blobs

and spooky Zac could drop like skulls or ghosts
Wow these are great. Detailed and unique unlike Special Weapon Zac. If Riot does use one of these skins Zac actually might get some love that he derserves!
i really love the Pool Party & the Spooky skins, the Banana Split skin is cool also all though i'm not a fan of the snowmans desgine
The pool party zach is a no brainer really... {{champion:154}}
...yes...that is all...
za-Casper the friendly ghost?
Pool party Zac. How did that not already happen? That is awesome. Take my money Riot, please.
Banana Split Zac is awesome. I wanna see him alongside Lollypoppy, Bittersweet Lulu, Sinful Succulence Morgana, and either Dark Candy or Surprise Party Fiddlesticks, for a whole sugar-themed team.
Banana Split one made me hungry.
I would say that Pool Party Zac is the best opportunity to bring back this theme up? It is different, and awesome! I vote for this one.
Pool Party Zac looks awesome
riot please. give us the banana split skin
these are all wonderful ideas thanks for sharing! seriously great skins, i would definitely buy every single one, iffy about the snowman one tho

Hell to the yes.
I enjoy the hell out of Zac, but sadly he's not too good right now.
He needs some skin love.

You forgot his suit!

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/WB7adxuk-skin-suit-up-zac

the pool party is to die for, the ice cream is really nice, and thought out, the spooky is so amazing i want it. And the snowman one is decent, i think it'd need a bit more in some respect.
ZAC skins 2014
So what if, instead of blobs, spooky zac's passive sends out a terrified teemo that cowers in fear, and zac gets to squash him to heal? xD
Banana Split Zac sounds pretty... *sweet*. Snowman Zac sounds really *cool* too. Ahahahahaa! ... I'm a horrible person. :(

These are AWESOME.

If riot made banana spilt zac, i would instabuy that so hard.

Legendary skin maybe?

This thread needs a red post, these are so cool.

Although i have been really hoping for him to get a pool party skin...{{item:3070}}

Pool Party: swimming with Zac or swimming in Zac?

is he in the pool or is he the pool?
well that's the mystery, isn't it?
they're doing it wrong if you're going to make a skin for Zac you're obviously supposed to just change the color like his current skins (which is green to purple lawl)

Actually Special Weapon Zac has an almost completely overworked model.

It's leaner, his hand and feet are more clawlike, the jaw is different, he has three extensions on his head and extensions on his elbows.
thought riot said making a skin would be hard?
yea, he needs a new skin and pool party zac looks awesome.
bump
